allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Switch to Google Gemini LLM and expand credit card database

- Replace Anthropic with Google Gemini \(gemini-2.5-flash model\)
- Update Google Places API to use new Places API \(New\) endpoint
- Expand credit card seed data from 26 to 148 cards across 14 banks
- Add HSBC bank and cards
- Remove deprecated OfferResponse schema import

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
